Adderall na Mydayis bụ aha azụmaahịa[ ndetu 2] maka ngwakọta ọgwụ a na-akpọ salts amphetamine agwakọtara nwere nnu anọ nke amphetamine
Ngwakọta ahụ bụ akụkụ nha anya agbụrụ amphetamine na dextroamphetamine, nke na-emepụta oke (3: 1) n'etiti dextroamphetamine na levoamphetamine, abụọ enantiomers nke amphetamine

Abụọ enantiomers bụ ihe na-akpali akpali, mana dị iche iche iji nye Adderall mmetụta mmetụta dị iche na nke amphetamine agbụrụ ma ọ bụ dextroamphetamine,   nke a na-ere ahịa dị ka Evekeo na Dexedrine/Zenzedi, otu n'otu
A na-eji Adderall mee ihe n'ịgwọ ọrịa nlebara anya hyperactivity (ADHD) na narcolepsy
A na-ejikwa ya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị dị ka ihe nkwalite mmemme egwuregwu, nkwalite ihe ọmụma, ihe na-egbochi agụụ, na ntụrụndụ dị ka ihe ụtọ
Ọ bụ sistemu ụjọ nke etiti (CNS) na-akpali akpali nke klas phenethylamine.
